website_summaries.verdict: The Pulse with Noonlight is ideal for civilian users because of its range, accuracy, and stopping power.
pros: Connects to an app that notifies law enforcement after deployment
Ideal 15-foot range for self-defense.Target is immobilized for at least 30 seconds
cons: Package may not contain a sticky holster
Battery life is limited and replacement packs are expensive

customer_reviews.title: Taser Taser Taser!!

customer_reviews.title: Is it a toy. Is it tiny...... Yes
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a toy not sure who would look at it and say huh but great product non the less will do the job
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is pathetic
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself and one for the wife. They are supposed to be good for so many uses and so many years of shelf life. After owning ours for 6 months and never having deployed them, both had dead battery packs. Bought replacement battery packs (at $40/ea) and they were dead within 6 months as well. This would be a great system if it was reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a gun and might get you shot. The civilian models have poor durability. Sufficient probe spread for a reasonable chance of incapacitation occurs at 8 to 15 feet. It is can be difficult to justify the use of potentially deadly force when the threat is 8 feet away. Also, they can hit their head when falling or they might have a heart problem.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: Flawed battery and marginal customer service by Axon
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice unit...but there’s a flaw in the battery pak design and pigtail length. Had to return the unit to Taser after about a month due to battery failures. New batteries draining or indicating drained after two days with no usage. Taser was unable to replicate the issue. If you call, they only assist by phone if you are a law enforcement agency. Otherwise, you are transferred to the “consumer” department and in my experience, the phone is not answered....be prepared to send an email back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Red Zone

product_meta.title: Taser Pulse + Self-Defense Tool with Noonlight Mobile Integration, Black
product_meta.description:
The TASER Pulse+ brings safety in today's connected world.

Using the same less-lethal technology as law enforcement, the Pulse+ integrates with your mobile phone via the Noonlight mobile app to contact emergency dispatch when fired. No fumbling for the phone or freezing up in fear. Pull the trigger and help is on the way. 
Weighing in at just 8 ounces, this high-tech, intuitively-designed device is revolutionizing the self-defense market. You're fast-paced and connected. Your self-defense tool should be too. 

- Comfortable to carry and use – Shaved safeties and angled sights make the Pulse ergonomic to carry and draw
- Fast on target – Built-in LASER helps you aim quickly
- Effective up close – Contact stun capabilities help at close range or in the event of a missed shot
- Easy to maintain – The battery indicator ensures you know your tool will work when you need it. The Pulse+ uses easy-to-replace CR123 batteries, which are carried by many retail stores.
- Legal to own, legal to carry – No license needed in most states
feature_bullets: TASER SELF-DEFENSE X NOONLIGHT MOBILE INTEGRATION: Noonlight dispatches law enforcement to the user’s location immediately if the trigger is pulled, using real-time GPS tracking provided through the Noonlight mobile application
STAY CONNECTED: As long as the Pulse+ device is within range of your mobile phone, it will be connected - even if the safety is in the on position
OPTIMIZED SELF-DEFENSE RANGE – 15-foot shooting distance, ideal for most defensive situations

POWERFUL PROTECTION ENSURES A SAFE ESCAPE: 30-second muscular override gives you time to get away, and we'll replace your taser device free of charge. read more about our safe escape product replacement guarantee
EASY TO MAINTAIN: the battery indicator ensures you know your tool will work when you need it. The Pulse+ uses easy-to-replace CR123 batteries, which are carried by many retail stores
Mobile Requirements:iOS app supports iOS 8+ and Android app supports API level 19+ (Android 4.4 KitKat)
